name: Tank Duel
description:
First time participating in a Game Jam by myself! It was a really fun experience to create something start to finish with the limitations provided! Please enjoy my approach to the one minute time limit and 2 player theme!

Credits

Levels created by me with the assistance of probuilder
Title Screen and End Screens created by me in Photoshop
Tank model made by me in Blender

Music

"Obliteration" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
